attributes.action: ban the school run and ease congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as everyone who drives to work in a morning knows. when the kids are off school there is far less traffic congestion. this is because of the kids been taken to school by car. banning the school run would have several effects. 1 reduce congestion 2 increase safety outside schools. 3 reduce harmfull co2 emmisions. 4 improve the heath of children by breathing in less pollutants and getting fitter by walking more often.
